title: #456 Cold Hearts Warm Farts with Steve Rannazzisi
itunes:title: Cold Hearts Warm Farts with Steve Rannazzisi
description:
Steve Rannazzisi came over to the new studio to talk about how much we hate winter and a bunch of other random things like the new Jackass and what podcast would have the dumbest listeners. It's a fun one. 

Don't forget to get your tickets to Ari Shaffir's Renamed Storyteller Show at the Gramercy Theatre on February 8th. Crazy surprise lineup you're not gonna want to miss. Oh yeah, and my Instagram is back... Follow @AriShaffir before they take it down again because they definitely will. 

And get tickets to the taping of Sean Patton's Comedy Special in New Orleans on February 3rd:

https://tipitinas.com/e/sean-patton-live-special-taping-pm--194663763557/

 

For more Ari: 

Subscribe on YouTube 

Join Ari's Patreon 

Shop Merch 

Follow Ari on Instagram - @arishaffir 

Ari Shaffir - Linktree

 

2022 Tour Dates & Tickets 

02/08 | NYC: Ari Shaffir’s Renamed Storyteller Show 

02/11 | Tampa 

02/17 | Denver 

02/27 | Vancouver

03/25 | Grand Rapids

03/26 | Detroit

03/31 | Appleton, WI 

 

For more Steve:

Steve Rannazzisi - Tour Dates  

Instagram - @steverannazzisi 

 

What's the Odds? with Steve Rannazzisi on Apple Podcasts 

What's the Odds? with Steve Rannazzisi | Podcast on Spotify 

 

The Music:

The Winter is Cold - Wende and Bonnie

Bangles - Hazy Shade of Winter

Foreigner - Cold As Ice

Love Unlimited - It May Be Winter Outside

 

Thank you to our sponsors! Yokratom home of the $60 Kilo and head over to 3Chi.com and use promo code "Ari" for 5% off your order.
